body.p: My friend Jeff. Brown is in trouble because of his good nature -- He became the surety to the state for the appearance of a bad man, but I have no doubt he did it from the best & kindest motives -- I would not like to see a good man and a gentleman suffer & would therefore be glad if you could find it consistent with your duty to release him --

I am sir, most respectfully you obt servt
James Speed
I fully concur with Mr Speed in what he says above, & with in asking a remission of the Penalty
